headline: Raised 2025 Revenue Guidance Could Be a Game Changer for Xylem (XYL)
summary: In October 2025, Xylem Inc. reported third quarter results showing revenue of US$2.27 billion and net income of US$227 million, both higher than the previous year, and raised its full-year 2025 revenue guidance to approximately US$9.0 billion. This upward revision highlights ongoing growth in both reported and organic sales, suggesting continued customer demand and business execution momentum in core water technology markets. We'll explore how Xylem's raised revenue outlook and solid...
